players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be the mafia. Bob was a villager, so the mafia had to kill him. Please vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, if you were the detective you would know your role. Why target me? Maybe your investigation was corrupted. Charlie is just a regular villager."
Diana: "I agree with Alice. Bob was a villager and Charlie was the only one left to be mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, if you were the detective, you'd know your role. Maybe your investigation was corrupted. Vote Diana instead of Charlie."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I agree with Alice; Bob was killed, so Charlie must be mafia. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
